name: SUPER PUZZLE BROS.
description:
Controls
  • A / D or Left Arrow / Right Arrow to control your character.
  • Space to jump.
  • F to switch between characters.
  • R to restart the level.
  • Q to open main menu.
  • M to mute sounds.
Description

SUPER PUZZLE BROS is a one-player cooperative puzzle-platfotmer where you play as two puzzle pieces who are desparate to meet. Your goal as the player is to help them reunite.

Our heroes will have to join forces to solve multiple physical puzzles and challenge (they might even need to travel through portals, who knows..)

Credits
  • Code, Art, Game Design, VFX - Roman Paramonov aka rommat
  • Code, Level/Game Design, SFX - Anton Harybin aka Shlapoosnick
  • Music:
    • Artist: Jayxce
    • Song: SWORD (Remix)
    • Album: ALTERNATE TIMELINE
    • Composed by Jarno Salo
